main event: A civilian observer reported sighting two bright lights near the Denver airport on October 31, 1967.
interesting points: The observer described the objects as having green and blue lights around them., The observer noted the sighting lasted for about 2 minutes., Despite the report, no official records were made into the Denver Monitoring Post., The presence of multiple aircraft in the area was suggested as a possible explanation., The report went to various authorities including the Department of Transportation and Air Force.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
witness description: a civilian observer near the Denver airport
